sentence.Network_en: Don't hold on to pleasantness, let it come and go.

sentence.Network_en: Her ways are ways of pleasantness, and all her paths are peace.
sentence.Network_cn: 她的大道是快乐的大道, 而她的一切小道是和平.

sentence.Network_en: Pardons and pleasantness are great revenge of slanders.
sentence.Network_cn: 宽恕与一笑置之是对诽谤者的最大报复.
